name: alleged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 said or thought by some people to be the stated bad or illegal thing, although you have no proof: It took 15 years for the alleged criminals (= people thought to be criminals) to prove their innocence.
More examplesFewer examplesSeveral alleged drug lords are to be put on trial.Opposition parties have protested over alleged vote rigging in the election.Less than two weeks ago Gough finally served a writ on Slater, claiming damages for alleged loss of royalties.They were in the house when the alleged crime took place.He is being hunted by police for his alleged involvement in several murders.
